attributes.title: AWFUL APP
attributes.review: i got this app because i wanted to stay updated on the news for daddy trump. this app took TEN DAYS to download and i am absolutely appalled because i was not able to use my phone during those ten days. once the app was downloaded, i opened it so i can learn more about my lord and savior bunker boy. however, instead of seeing news about the almighty trump my phone started playing the “My Little Pony” theme song. i should inform you that this song brings very bad memories to me because i was thrown into shark infested waters while this song was playing in the background. as this song was playing i had a very bad panic attack that led me into going unconscious for 3 hours. once i woke up, i discovered that trump found my address from hacking into my phone via this app and he showed up to my house. he came to my house waving around his trump flag screaming “MAKE AMERICA GREAT AGAIN” and “FAKE NEWS”. i feared for my life in this moment. he started stomping around destroying everything in my house. HE EVEN THREW MY LITTLE SISTER OUT OF OUR WINDOW AND STARTED DOING THE MACARENA AROUND MY SISTER’S BROKEN BODY. we had to rush her to the hospital and it took hours of surgery to get her body back to normal. the hospital bill was outrageous due to the awful healthcare system that we have in place. now everything in our house is broken and we are poor due to the cost of the hospital bill. we are now living in a Walmart parking lot and our only source of food is grass, bugs, and leaves. long story short, this app is AWFUL and it RUINED MY LIFE.
